meanings.definition: The quality or state of being promiscuous.
meanings.sent1: Her promiscuousness was evident in her relationships with multiple partners.
meanings.sent2: The promiscuousness of the cat, who would cuddle with anyone, was endearing.
meanings.sent3: The promiscuousness of the weather, changing its mind constantly, kept us on our toes.
meanings.sent4: The promiscuousness of the colors in the painting created a chaotic yet intriguing effect.
meanings.sent5: The promiscuousness of the student's study habits led to a broad but shallow understanding of the subject.

meanings.definition: The practice of having casual sexual relations frequently with different partners.
meanings.sent1: His promiscuousness caused tension in his social circle.
meanings.sent2: The promiscuousness of the character in the novel added drama to the plot.
meanings.sent3: The promiscuousness of the bees pollinating various flowers amused the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The promiscuousness of the waves crashing against different shores symbolized freedom.
meanings.sent5: The promiscuousness of the chef trying out various recipes delighted the restaurant patrons.

meanings.sent1: The promiscuousness use of colors in the painting created a vibrant but chaotic scene.
meanings.sent2: Her promiscuousness shopping habits often led to impulse buys.
meanings.sent3: The promiscuousness mixing of genres in the movie made it hard to classify.
meanings.sent4: The promiscuousness distribution of flyers around town attracted a diverse audience.
meanings.sent5: The promiscuousness growth of weeds in the garden indicated neglect.
